attributes.action: Supervise All AID sent to third world countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many professional British people who came from third word countries and have now adopted the British way of life( Eg: Myself).Why don't the British government recruit them to supervise ALL AID sent to help their mother countries to prevent corrupt officials from these countries abusing this AID?
